doc:
Alexandra Bastedo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alexandra_Bastedo 0 Alexandra Lendon Bastedo (9 March 1946 – 12 January 2014) was a British actress, best known for her role as secret agent Sharron Macready in the 1968 British espionage/science fiction adventure series The Champions. She has been cited as a sex symbol of the 1960s and 1970s. Bastedo was a vegetarian and animal welfare advocate. Alexandra_Lendon_Bastedo ( 9_March_1946 – 12_January_2014 ) was a_British_actress , best_known for her_role as secret_agent_Sharron_Macready in the_1968_British_espionage/science_fiction_adventure_series The_Champions . She has_been_cited as a_sex_symbol of the_1960s_and_1970s . Bastedo was a_vegetarian_and_animal_welfare_advocate .
